channel.title: Posts on Brett's Sports Data Analysis
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Brett's Sports Data Analysis

item.title: NBA Betting Post Analysis
item.description: I consider myself a casual NBA fan. I do not watch much of the regular season, but when the playoffs roll around, I begin to watch a lot. I know a lot of the players, enough about basketball, and enough general knowledge to make me think I could have done good enough in this project. When I first heard about this project, I thought it would be an opportunity to watch more of the NBA, to see if my bets hit.

item.title: NCAA Post Mortem
item.description: library(tidyverse) ## -- Attaching packages --------------------------------------- tidyverse 1.3.1 -- ## v ggplot2 3.3.5 v purrr 0.3.4 ## v tibble 3.1.6 v dplyr 1.0.7 ## v tidyr 1.1.4 v stringr 1.4.0 ## v readr 2.1.1 v forcats 0.5.1 ## -- Conflicts ------------------------------------------ tidyverse_conflicts() -- ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() library(tidymodels) ## Registered S3 method overwritten by 'tune': ## method from ## required_pkgs.model_spec parsnip ## -- Attaching packages -------------------------------------- tidymodels 0.
